job_history.role_name: Mortgage Banking Default Operations Specialist II
job_history.work_description: Responds to internal inquiries from customer service specialists regarding issues such as missing documents, ordering certain third party services and reviewing 'specialty flags'. Facilitate the gathering of underwriting documents for both pre and post underwriting decision making. Responsible for conducting research on mortgage files currently in litigation. Present results to management with issues and potential risks identified. Receives decision/results from underwriting and QC review and process according to decision. Communicate effectively with borrowers attorney on status of the loss mitigation and/or liquidation. Assess and analyze trial plan and/or modification document detail and verify against modification portal (PEGA). Thorough understanding of investor requirements and impact potential to loss mitigation and default foreclosure processes. Coordinate tactic initiatives to better streamline department processes & procedures to present to senior management.

Responsible for setting and striking general session/meeting room exhibit labor including load-in & out with install and dismantle, audio, video, and/or lighting assist. Coordinate and/or assist technical crews at various sites. Work with inventory control to ensure complete equipment coverage for clients are established. Operates multi-media equipment. Responsible for all technical labor of production, ensuring picture, sound, and quality. Performs maintenance of audio-visual equipment. Coordinate meetings with sales manager for planned/unplanned events to determine requirements from client. Experience and evolving knowledge in Photoshop and InDesign such as Adobe Creative Cloud. Build strong relationships with future and current clients to promote services of PSAV.

Liaison between Vendor, Lender, Attorney and Borrower for refinance closing files. Processed and preformed quality checks on all documents from lenders and attorneys for accuracy. Ensured each state guideline in reference to closing instructions were followed. Responded to inquiries from borrowers, lenders, and attorneys to resolve discrepancies. Prepared title company closing documents in timely and professional manner. Worked to build strong partnerships with local lenders, realtors, and attorneys. Prior to closing, called and confirmed with lenders and borrowers to ensure original schedule was met.

Conducted needed analysis to determine training needs and appropriate training methods based on subject matter and target audience. Developed classroom-based, virtual facilitation, and eLearning programs. Developed high quality materials: participant guides, worksheets, job aids, and facilitator manuals. Established performance objectives, learning outcomes, and assessment tools. Attend project status meetings for applicable information on training programs. Conduct Train-the-Trainer forum for new programs. Facilitate training classes as needed.

Act as a liaison between the borrower and the Investor requesting doc within a timely manner. Processed Conventional, FNMA, GNMA, FHLMC, FHA, VA, DSI, Jumbo, 203k Rehab, and 2nd mortgages (HELOC). Manage a daily pipeline of 60 to 80 loans. Develop reporting for projected workflow daily.

Managed a team of 15 associate who took calls regarding Bankruptcy and Property Claims. Coached new Hires. Conducted On the Job Training for associates. Assisted homeowners with general questions and servicing of their mortgage and home equity loans. Created procedures for servicing and Foreclosure guidelines.

Provided superior customer service while managing multiple projects. Provided Help Desk solution. Resolved all customer complaints to ensure the utmost customer service. Trouble shoot IP address for VOIP.
Assisted with preventative maintenance for security. Troubleshooted and repaired Hardware and Software issue. Reviewed surveys from quality assurance.
Accurately measured vinyl siding. Trained new employees on proper work ethics. Assisted in quality control ensuring a higher quality product for clients.

skills.name: Mortgage Banking
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in mortgage banking, including default operations, underwriting, and loan processing, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Consistently demonstrated strong customer service skills across various roles, including customer service management and team leadership, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Held multiple leadership roles, including team leader, manager, and corporate trainer, indicating strong proficiency in leadership and team management.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Coordinated and managed multiple projects, including training programs and department processes, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with various stakeholders, including borrowers, lenders, attorneys, and management, demonstrating strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Consistently demonstrated problem-solving skills, including troubleshooting and resolving customer complaints, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Managed multiple tasks and projects simultaneously, including daily pipelines and reporting, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Training and Development
skills.explanation: Developed and facilitated training programs, including classroom-based and virtual facilitation, indicating strong proficiency in training and development.

skills.name: Audio-Visual Technology
skills.explanation: Operated multi-media equipment and performed maintenance tasks, showing a solid working proficiency in audio-visual technology.

skills.name: Adobe Creative Cloud
skills.explanation: Had experience with Photoshop and InDesign, showing some practical experience with Adobe Creative Cloud.

skills.name: Computer Networking
skills.explanation: Had education and training in computer networking, showing some practical experience.
